CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 26, 1955, pg. 8, reads: "Fire Victim - Ronald Walker, 13 of 174 Devilliers Street, heavily bandaged, is being treated at Mercy Hospital for second-degree burns of his chest, back and arms which he received Saturday morning from standing too close to a kitchen stove. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Nurse adjusting pillow of burn victim Ronald Walker, in Mercy Hospital
